attributes.review: So I was just downloading this app cause my friends said “aye the fat Cheeto has a app!” I’m like oooh he does now, so I downloaded it and the angry fat Cheeto kicked me through the screen. This left injury’s such as a broken rib and a broken leg, ouch!
attributes.title: This app hurt me!
